Maybe Clinton paid Trump to run for president, and rigged both Primary elections.... Trump is so easy to hate, but so is Clinton... I have more faith in America than where this campaign is at right now. I have ZERO faith in the system in place now, and I think that everyone here should question it. Stop assuming that stupid people are voting for these morons, honestly, our nation would literally be in flames right now if there were enough people to get these two this close to office.

I agree. Ok, so we don't know her story... BUT... it's hard enough raising ONE child in today's economy with both parents in the home. Unless both of you have a good, stable, well paying career with enough for a rainy year in a savings account or a great life insurance policy, people should know better than to bring more kids into this world to suffer, starve or end up homeless. I have one child and am a single mother myself. There's absolutely no way I'm having any more kids until all of the monetary conditions above are met. It's super hard with one and unless she had been a twin or triplet there's no way I'd be ready for 2 more. You have to be stupid to not think everything through after the first child.

What the """"authorities"""" are doing against the Standing Rock protesters is criminal, and acting against our constitution by attacking peaceful protesters is treasonous.
